greeting-text: Little Italy is bringing Italian AMORE to your neighborhood! Just like in New York’s “Little Italy” district, you can now find culinary superstars and real insider tips in your city. Let the pizzeria of your choice deliver directly to you or quickly pick up your order yourself.
slide-1: Little Italy brings you Italian AMORE near you! Just like in New York's “Little Italy” district, you can now find culinary superstars and real insider tips in your city.
slide-2: Find the very best independent pizzerias in your area. Become a patron for one pizza place or try every excellent pizza of the city.
slide-3-header: Simply have it delivered or pick up quickly
slide-3: Let the pizzeria of your choice deliver directly to you or quickly pick up your order yourself.

take-and-bake: Take & Bake (from you at home freshly baked)

commig-soon-detail: Sorry, Little Italy is not yet available in your location. We are working hard to expand our service to be available in your area soon.

location-permission-ios: Location Service must be enabled in order to get current position. Please enable location access
location-permission-android: Location Service must be enabled in order to get current position. Please enable GPS location and give the location permissions from App-level permissions
we-are-currently-closed-message: We are currently closed. You are welcome to look around and order at a later time.

delete-cart-item-confirmation: Do you want to delete this dish from your cart?
restaurant-mis-match: You can not add multiple restaurant's dish at same time!

coupon-errors.apply-on-pickup-option-only: This coupon is only applicable on pickup option!

pizza-from-all-over-world: Pizza from all over the world 🍕

delivery-info-text: Delivery is currently taking a little longer than planned. Get 20% onall pizzas.
different-restaurant-cart-validation-err: You have an active shopping cart at another company. Would you like to delete the shopping cart and look around here?
different-preorderdate-validation-error-: You have an active shopping cart at another preorder date. Would you like to replace this selected preorder date?
